synopsis.text: Childman and Azalie embark on a journey that leads them to the discovery of the legendary Sword of Baldanders, as revealed in this exclusive unaired episode packaged with the second Blu-ray/DVD box volume. Orphen prepares to depart for Kimluck, setting the stage for new adventures. Originally streamed on April 7, 2020, this special episode was officially released on May 8, 2020, inviting viewers to explore the enchanting world of this anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
